buddhi ansha niladharin, pupurana drawya wisheshagnyayin, maragena marena bombakaruwan, kalathuwakku kandayam, pa්rahara nirikshakayan me aadi lesa ithama daksha, hakiyawangen sapiri kandayamak el.ti.ti.ee yata sitiya.namuth pa්rabhakaran, el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaya sampa්radayika hamudawaka mattamata path kirima nisa ee kisiwakugen wath awasanaye pa්rayojanayak nathiwa giya.hoda mattamaka thibunu owunge samajikayan badawaganime wadapiliwelath bida watuna.thawath karanayak wune shi්ra lanka yuda hamudawa yuda peramunu kihipayak osse pa්rahara ella karamin sitima.mema pa්rahara walata muhunadennata haki piris balayak el.ti.ti.ee yata thibune naha.

mage nama pulasthi.mage iha nikata wayasa balala godak aya mata kiyanne pulasthi ayiya kiyala.anuradha mallige podi ayata mama pulasthi mahappa.thri wil pak eke bokkawal walata mama nikamma nikam pula.pulasthi kawwath,pula kiwwath,pulasthi ayiya kiwwath ee hama namakinma hadunwanne ekama panchaskandhaya thamayi.pulasthi wana mata blog ekak liyanna hithune dawasakda pandara.kama mesedi.aappa giladana athare mama deshapalane gana tok ekak denna gaththa.kawuruth mawa thambaekata ganan gaththe naha."mahappe wada nodi kama tika kannako"anuradha mallige podi ewun tika kiwwa.asu haradahata mata nagge podi ewunuth mata loku tok dana nisa"hitapiyawu"mama dath hapagena matama kiyagaththa."umbaalata mawa epa nam mage ayidiyas mama danawa sayibar awakashayata""ful aathal" mallige loku eka kiwwa."sayibar awakase gada gahayi"anuradha bos kiwwa."pula mara ayitam ekane"pol ganna kadeta giya welawaka kathawa ahapu wimalarathna mudalali hina wewi kiyala mage pitata thattuwak dammamage margayen intanet ekata nama daganna wimale lokkata ayidiya ekak thiyenawada danne naha.kohoma hari onna mama liyanna gannawa.mage ayidiya walata brek naha wagema mage liwillatath giyar naha.meke wyakarana hoyanna enna epa ee hinda.mama walayek nowunata alayekuth neme.mekata warana dannath enna epa ee hinda.ayidiya walata warana danne napunsakayo neda?warana nathi (wanarayanuth nathi) lokayaka - sabada api set wemu !
